column4: hi. GOOGLE EARTH 5 does not run. could give you a logfile - could anyone help me?
google earth 5 in linux, well at least ubuntu, doesn't work as it should. you have to use a workaround: http://ubuntu-install.blogspot.com/2009/03/google-earth-5-in-ubuntu.html
I have it working fine but you must use the workaround
